itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the National Guard deploying to the Capitol and if there will be any attacks on Inauguration Day, Matthew McConaughey being declared Alt-Right by left wing social media, Nancy Pelosi breaking her own brand new gendered words rule in Congress literally the first session after she wrote them, Jack Dorsey’s reaction to banning Trump and how much money Twitter has lost since doing so, if Donald Trump will leave the country after he’s out of office — plus a Canadian couple gets fined for fetish play after the woman walked her husband like a dog in public.
